Don’t let the @GOP fool you. The #GOPTaxScam isn’t meant to help middle class families get the help they deserve. It’s flat-out Reverse Robin Hood – stealing from average Americans to further line the pockets of the rich. (12/12)
Banks also WIN under the #GOPTaxScam, w/ a potential $6.4 billion tax cut for the 6 biggest banks. (11/)
Elimination of the estate tax will save President Trump & Commerce Secretary Ross ~1.1 billion & will save DeVos ~$351 mil, Mnuchin ~$244 mil & Rex Tillerson ~$150 mil (10/)
Real estate moguls like @realDonaldTrump & Jared Kushner will save millions through exemptions from major deduction eliminations. (9/)
So who actually WINS under the #GOPTaxScam? The spoils of this tax plan go overwhelmingly to the richest Americans, including @realDonaldTrump & his cronies. (8/)

Small businesses LOSE under the #GOPTaxScam. Most small businesses already pay less than 25% tax rate. Even this cut will mostly benefit LLC and S-corporate owners like @realDonaldTrump & Betsy DeVos’s family. (7/)
Homebuyers LOSE under the #GOPTaxScam. The House tax plan would shrink by half the mortgage interest deduction for all new mortgages. (6/)

Sick people LOSE under the #GOPTaxScam. The House version of the bill eliminates the medical expense deduction used by families w/ high medical bills who need to cover costly procedures insurance won’t cover. (5/)

Teachers LOSE under the #GOPTaxScam. The bill eliminates a tax credit for the 99% of teachers who use their own $ for classroom supplies. Meanwhile, corporations will still be allowed to deduct business expenses like office supplies. (4/)

Students LOSE under the #GOPTaxScam. Tuition fee waivers will be treated as taxable income, raising grad student’s taxes. Elimination of the student loan deduction & deduction for employer-provided assistance will worsen the student debt crisis. (3/)
Children LOSE under the #GOPTaxScam. The weakened child tax credit excludes 10 million low-income children & doesn't help the families that need it most. (2/)
.@realDonaldTrump & his fans are obsessed with WINNERS and LOSERS. So who WINS and who LOSES under the #GOPTaxScam? (THREAD)
